title: New:  tUnE-yArDs – Gangsta (Ad-Rock Remix)
body:
Back in April, CITR’s Joel posted a review of [tUnE-yArD’s second album](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6893-review-tune-yards-w-h-o-k-i-l-l/ "tuneyards remix") & since then I’ve been listening again and again. I just can’t get enough and it seems seminal Beastie Boy, Ad-Rock can’t either. His remix of Gangsta speaks for itself so without further ado stream and download the track below.

(Thanks to Matt at [You Ain’t No Picasso](http://www.youaintnopicasso.com/  "Awesome blog, YANP") for the tip)
